title: MRB constant
summary: The MRB constant is a mathematical constant, with decimal expansion 0.187859â€¦ (sequence A037077 in the OEIS). The constant is named after its discoverer, Marvin Ray Burns, who published his discovery of the constant in 1999.[1] Burns had initially called the constant "rc" for root constant[2] but, at Simon Plouffe's suggestion, the constant was renamed the 'Marvin Ray Burns's Constant', or "MRB constant".[3]
